ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:13:36 [Issue ID 4000-107608] urn:comicvine:4000-107608 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:12:55. [Issue ID 230288]
ComicInfo.Summary: The WildC.A.T.s tangle with Hightower, who implores them for assistance. He explains how he is searching for a key that could power up the Daemonite starship and wants the WildC.A.T.s to help him find it. He continues to explain that a Daemonite named Lord Defile is also searching for the keys and wants to destroy the planet with the technology on the starship. Lord Emp agrees to team up with Hightower and Grifter quits the team in disgust. Meanwhile, it seems that Savant may have one of the keys and Mister White, with some members of the Mercs, comes to retrieve it. Fortunately, Mister Majestic arrives to help her and defeats the Mercs. Union then arrives, challenging Mister Majestic to a fight.
ComicInfo.Title: Wildstorm Rising Chapter 2
